PICTURE ATTRIBUTES
==================
- pic_id: Auto-increment primary key
- event_id: Foreign key to events table
- pic_name: Filename (e.g., event_1_pic_1.jpg)
- pic_upload_date: Date picture was uploaded (typically day after event)
- pic_note: Optional note field
- pic_locator: Unique ID format "E{event_id}P{sequence}" (e.g., E1P1, E1P2, E7P1, E7P2)
- pic_is_active: Boolean (true/false)
- pic_path: Storage path (e.g., events/1/event_1_pic_1.jpg)
- pic_upload_note: Optional upload note

IMPORTANT NOTES
===============
1. Pictures DO NOT have a direct category relationship
2. Pictures inherit category from their event
3. Picture locator uses sequential numbering per event (E7P1, E7P2, E7P3)
4. All pictures are stored in: storage/app/public/events/{event_id}/
5. Total pictures across all events: ~150
6. Upload date is typically 1 day after the event date
